manikiourPerigrafi:
Experience the ultimate in hand pampering with our manicure services. 
We cater to your unique tastes with our wide range of trendy, classic, and innovative designs. 

Whether you're a fan of understated elegance or you love to dazzle with a bold splash of color, we've got you covered. We adhere to strict hygiene standards, ensuring a safe, comfortable experience every time.

We believe your feet deserve a treat, and our specialized pedicure services offer just that. 
Unwind as we gently exfoliate and moisturize your feet, giving them the care and attention they often miss. 

We cater to a wide variety of preferences, offering an array of chic and sophisticated nail polish colors and designs to suit your style. Our pedicure services are all about enhancing beauty and fostering relaxation.

Whether you're going out for a casual gathering or heading to a grand evening, we assure you an exceptional look that resonates with your individuality.
nigikoMakigiazPerigrafi:
On the most special day of your life, allow us to create a look of unforgettable elegance with our specialized bridal makeup service. We meticulously craft an exquisite look based on your personal style and the theme of your wedding, ensuring that you are the radiant bride you've always dreamed of. 

We work with precision to highlight your best features and create a harmonious blend of modern trends and timeless grace. We understand the importance of a look that is not only breathtaking on the day of the wedding but also eternal in photographs. For this reason, we assure a perfect and long-lasting makeup for you.
